thread.title: Someone Put Eddie Murphy into the Beauty And The Beast Trailer and Now It’s the Only Version We Need
thread.title_full: Someone Put Eddie Murphy into the Beauty And The Beast Trailer and Now It’s the Only Version We Need

author: Dana Eisenberg
title: Someone Put Eddie Murphy into the Beauty And The Beast Trailer and Now It’s the Only Version We Need
text:
Yikes, Ivanka Trump Jewelry Company Owes Thousands in Back Taxes VIDEO Someone Put Eddie Murphy into the Beauty And The Beast Trailer and Now It’s the Only Version We Need by Dana Eisenberg | 7:52   
Fans of the original Beauty And The Beast are anxiously awaiting March 17th when Emma Watson takes the big screen as Belle in the live-action version. We’ve gotten several tastes and in a few of them, we’ve even gotten to hear Watson sing. But, Italian visual artist Aldo Jones noticed that there’s something missing from the original teasers, and as it turns out, it’s a whole lot of Eddie Murphy . 
Jones makes lots of “Weird Trailers” and posts them to his YouTube channel. And after seeing this one for Beauty And The Beast , we’re pretty sure they’re the only trailers we need. 
Watch above, via Aldo Jones. 
[featured image via screen grab] 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
